'''2.1.13827''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.13828''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.13829''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on April 17, 2020.

== Changes ==
* Added launcher release notes "What's new"
* Added launcher release notes highlight dialog
* Redesigned the About tab
* Fix issue with a maximum width of modal dialogs
* Clarified some error messages related to downloading
